translations.chinese: 八月，臨河南鄉，軍小脩武，欲復戰。
translations.english: In the eighth month, he faced Henan Xiang, encamped at Xiao Xiuwu, wanting to fight again.

translations.chinese: 郎中鄭忠說止漢 王，高壘深塹勿戰。
translations.english: Attendant Zheng Zhong advised King Han to stop, building high fortifications and deep moats without fighting.

translations.chinese: 漢王聽其計，使盧綰、劉賈將卒二萬人，騎數百，渡白馬津入楚地，佐彭越燒楚積聚，復擊破楚軍燕郭西，攻下睢陽、外黃十七城。
translations.english: King Han followed his plan, sending Lu Wan and Liu Jia with 20,000 troops and several hundred cavalry across Baima ford into Chu territory. They assisted Peng Yue in burning Chu's grain stores, then attacked and broke the Chu army west of Yan Guo, capturing Suiyang and Waihuang, 17 cities.

translations.chinese: 九月，羽謂 海春侯大司馬曹咎曰：「謹守成皋。
translations.english: In the ninth month, Xiang Yu said to Hai Chun Marquis Grand Marshal Cao Jiu: "Carefully guard Chenggao.

translations.chinese: 即漢王欲挑戰，慎勿與戰，勿令得東而已。
translations.english: If King Han wants to provoke battle, be careful not to fight him. Just do not let him get east."
